newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portugal's Sodim issues 6.5 bln esc 10-yr bond.
newsitem.headline: Portugal's Sodim issues 6.5 bln esc 10-yr bond.

text.p: Portuguese real estate company Sociedade de Investimentos Imobiliarios Sodim is launching a 6.5 billion escudo 10-year bond, indexed to six-month Lisbor plus 22.5 basis points in the first five years, leader Banco Essi said.
From the fifth year onwards, there is a step-up of 1/16 point each year, which is added to the rate indexed to Lisbor.
Servicing of the debt is assured by the pledge of Semapa shares held by the issuer, with a minimum coverage ratio of 1.3, which is revised with each coupon every six months.
